biography.value:
“Pull up a chair and hear the story of Runa Banasár. She proved that with enough willpower, you can overcome the cold of death as easily as the cold of the North.”

Revered Leader.

Runa Banasár was the leader of a northern tribe in time long forgotten. She lived for the thrill of the hunt, and her rare skills kept her clan fed for many years. Runa grew bored hunting wild game and left her home many times, exploring farther and farther to find bigger challenges. She returned home months or years later with the trophies from countless monsters and beasts.

Path to Undeath.

During her travels, Runa learned the ritual to become a @creature[memori lich|GHMG]. She feared aging and death. To become immortal and avoid frailty, Runa was willing to do whatever was required. She eventually slaughtered her clan to become a lich and maintain that status. Runa still travels the world, looking for fierce enemies and souls to maintain her undeath.

Runa Banasár's Traits p290[–]

Ideal.

"I can conquer anything, including death."

Bond.

"My strength has carried me from life to immortality. I'll meet any challenge."

Flaw.

"I'm no coward. I'll never back down from a fight."

Salvage p290[–]

Runa's prized possession is her +3 handaxe, which she calls @item[Coldrazor|GHMG] [...]. From her wanderings, she also carries trinkets worth at least 10,000 gp whether in raw value or to collectors.

Lore p291[–]

[[/save ability=intelligence dc=15]] (&Reference[skill=History]):

Runa Banasár belonged to the Stál clan and was one of the most powerful warriors who ever walked the North. Her axe, @item[Coldrazor|GHMG], is almost as legendary as she is.

[[/save ability=intelligence dc=20]] (&Reference[skill=History]):

Folklore says that, because of her cruel slaughtering of her kin, Runa sacrificed her shapechanging ability and instead channels death and fiery rage. In fact, her form is unchangeable.

description.value: Runa uses frightful presence and makes four attacks with @item[Coldrazor|GHMG]. She can use wall of fire in place of one attacks.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+15]]{+15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 ([[/damage 3d6 + 8 type=slashing]]) damage and 14 ([[/damage 4d6 type=cold]]) damage. @item[Coldrazor|GHMG] returns to Runa's hand immediately after it's thrown. When Runa scores a critical hit using @item[Coldrazor|GHMG] to make a melee attack, the damage is 32 ([[/damage 7d6 + 8 type=slashing]]) damage and 24 ([[/damage 8d6 type=cold]]) damage.

Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+15]]{+15} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 18 ([[/damage 3d6 + 8 type=slashing]]) damage and 14 ([[/damage 4d6 type=cold]]) damage. @item[Coldrazor|GHMG] returns to Runa's hand immediately after it's thrown. When Runa scores a critical hit using @item[Coldrazor|GHMG] to make a melee attack, the damage is 32 ([[/damage 7d6 + 8 type=slashing]]) damage and 24 ([[/damage 8d6 type=cold]]) damage.

Each creature of Runa's choice within 120 feet of and aware of her must succeed on a [[/save ability=wisdom dc=18]] saving throw or become &Reference[condition=stunned] for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Runa's Stunning Presence for the next 24 hours.

Runa creates a wall of fire on a solid surface within 120 feet of her. The wall can be up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts until the start of Runa's next turn. When the wall appears, each creature in its area must make a [[/save ability=dexterity dc=18]] saving throw, taking 45 ([[/damage 10d8 type=fire]]) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature takes 22 ([[/damage 5d8 type=fire]]) damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.
A weapon deals two extra dice of its damage when Runa hits with it (included in her attack).
No effect can alter Runa's form.
If Runa fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

activation.condition: If Runa fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

description.value: When Runa reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on her turn, she can take a bonus action to move up to half her speed and make a melee attack.

If destroyed while her memento skull remains intact, Runa gains a new body in [[/r 2d4]] days, regaining all her hit points and becoming active again. Her new body appears within 5 feet of the memento skull.
Runa has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.
When not wearing armor, Runa's Armor Class equals 10 + her Dexterity modifier + her Constitution modifier. She can use a @item[shield|PHB] while gaining this benefit.
When Runa takes damage from a creature within 5 feet of her, she can make a melee weapon attack against that creature.
Runa moves up to her speed.

Runa targets one &Reference[condition=stunned] creature she can see within 30 feet of her. The target must succeed on a [[/save ability=wisdom dc=18]] saving throw or be magically cursed. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on saving throws and takes 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) extra necrotic damage if hit with Runa's attacks using @item[Coldrazor|GHMG]. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

This action has no effect on undead or constructs, but plants have disadvantage on the saving throw. Each creature within 20 feet of Runa must make a [[/save ability=constitution dc=18]] saving throw, taking 38 ([[/damage 6d12 type=necrotic]]) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Runa can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Runa regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

  • @UUID[Actor.vVMFfQXvM4yOPa42.Item.VIRdH3MP57MFG92Y]{Attack}
  • @UUID[Actor.vVMFfQXvM4yOPa42.Item.c7V32ySrPA5P9lAL]{Move}
  • @UUID[Actor.vVMFfQXvM4yOPa42.Item.9pN8GvWBbiShZfTZ]{Curse of Cowardice}
  • @UUID[Actor.vVMFfQXvM4yOPa42.Item.vL7hFLXDJmWm98M8]{Siphon Vitality (Costs 3 Actions, )}
A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.
